Row.Help: Allows the use of basic tools, such as sharpened stones, clubs or simple hammers. Enables you to build [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Laborers[ENDCOLOR] and [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Settlers[ENDCOLOR].
Row.Quote: [NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"Edged tools are dangerous things to handle, and not infrequently do much hurt."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - Agnes Repplier.[NEWLINE][TAB]

Row.Help: Enables you to train the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Fire Eater[ENDCOLOR], the first ranged units in the game, and to build a [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Bonfire[ENDCOLOR] in Cities.
Row.Quote: [NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"Out of the frying pan, into the fire."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - Tertullian.[NEWLINE][TAB]

Row.Help: Enables you to train the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Fire Eater[ENDCOLOR], the first ranged units in the game, and to build a [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Bonfire[ENDCOLOR] in Cities.
Row.Quote: [NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"Out of the frying pan, into the fire."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - Tertullian.[NEWLINE][TAB]
[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"nuts and nuts."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - Milton Friedman.[NEWLINE][TAB]
[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"The perils of duck hunting are great - especially for the duck."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - Walter Cronkite.[NEWLINE][TAB]
[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"Coooook"[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - Noone.[NEWLINE][TAB]

Row.Help: Makes your community more organized, under your firm and benevolent leadership. Allows you to build the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Food Storage[ENDCOLOR] and the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Chieftain's Hut[ENDCOLOR].
Row.Quote: [NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"The problem of social organization is how to set up an arrangement under which greed will do the least harm."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - Milton Friedman.[NEWLINE][TAB]

Row.Help: Enables you to train [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Scouts[ENDCOLOR] and build the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Outpost[ENDCOLOR] improvement in Forests and Jungles. Also allows you to establish Embassies in other civilizations.
Row.Quote: [NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"A Scout is never taken by surprise; he knows exactly what to do when anything unexpected happens."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - Robert Baden-Powell.[NEWLINE][TAB]

Row.Help: Allows the use of basic tools, such as sharpened stones, clubs or simple hammers. Enables you to build [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Laborers[ENDCOLOR] and [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Settlers[ENDCOLOR].
Row.Quote: [NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"Edged tools are dangerous things to handle, and not infrequently do much hurt."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - Agnes Repplier.[NEWLINE][TAB]

Row.Help: Allows the use of basic tools, such as sharpened stones, clubs or simple hammers. Enables you to build [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Laborers[ENDCOLOR] and [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Settlers[ENDCOLOR].
Row.Quote: [NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"Edged tools are dangerous things to handle, and not infrequently do much hurt."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - Agnes Repplier.[NEWLINE][TAB]
[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"By and large, language is a tool for concealing the truth."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - George Carlin.[NEWLINE][TAB]
[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"The best weapon against an enemy is another enemy."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - Friedrich Nietzsche.[NEWLINE][TAB]

Row.Help: Ascend the throne of your kingdom and build your [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Palace[ENDCOLOR]. Unlocks the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Warrior[ENDCOLOR].
Row.Quote: [NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"To rule is easy, to govern difficult."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - Johann Wolfgang von Goethe.[NEWLINE][TAB]
TXT_KEY_TECH_ARCHERY_QUOTE
[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"Just as no one can be forced into belief, so no one can be forced into unbelief."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - Sigmund Freud.[NEWLINE][TAB]

Row.Help: Your citizens become skilled in rudimentary Art. They are now able to paint [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Cave Paintings[ENDCOLOR].
Row.Quote: [NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"A picture is worth a thousand words."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - Napoleon Bonaparte.[NEWLINE][TAB]
[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"Just as no one can be forced into belief, so no one can be forced into unbelief."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - Sigmund Freud.[NEWLINE][TAB]

TXT_KEY_TECH_POTTERY_QUOTE
TXT_KEY_TECH_TRAPPING_QUOTE

Row.Help: Reveals all [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Luxury Resources[ENDCOLOR] on the map.
Row.Quote: [NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"I refuse to believe that trading recipes is silly. Tuna Fish casserole is at least as real as corporate stock."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - Barbara Grizzuti Harrison.[NEWLINE][TAB]
